name: Fluctuation
description: After a successful Dimension Jump, you are inflicted with a chance to teleport to a random dimension at a random time, increasing in likelyhood every subsequent time you use Dimension Jump with a cap of 6 times. Upon randomly teleporting, you take damage and cannot use Dimension Jump for 2 minutes. Damage is dependent on how many times you used Dimension Jump. Chances go back down overtime.
